channel.title: CVE Feed for Web-Settler -- Testimonial Slider – Free Testimonials Slider Plugin (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Web-Settler -- Testimonial Slider – Free Testimonials Slider Plugin (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36851|2024-09-17T01:01:27.521Z -- web-settler -- testimonial%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20free%20testimonials%20slider%20plugin%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (editor or higher user role) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Web-Settler Testimonial Slider – Free Testimonials Slider Plugin (WordPress plugin) via parameters mpsp_posts_bg_color, mpsp_posts_description_color, mpsp_slide_nav_button_color.
